price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߞߏ߲ߞߏߟߌ߲߫ ߖߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߢߊߝߍ߬ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߲ ߞߵߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊߡߌ߲߬ ߖߌ߫ ߘߌߡߊ߲ ߠߊ߫
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā rawāsiya shāmikhātin wa-asqaynākum māan furātan
translations: and We gave you to drink
